00033 #ifndef MSQ_SAMPLE_HPP
00034 #define MSQ_SAMPLE_HPP
00035 
00036 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00037 #include <iosfwd>
00038 #include <stddef.h> // for size_t
00039 
00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00050 struct MESQUITE_EXPORT Sample {
00059   unsigned short dimension;
00060   
00072   unsigned short number;
00073   
00076   enum {
00078     SIDE_DIMENSION_BITS = 2,
00080     SIDE_NUMBER_BITS = 4,
00081     NUMBER_PACKED_BITS = SIDE_DIMENSION_BITS + SIDE_NUMBER_BITS,
00084     NUM_SAMPLE_SIDE_DIM = 1u << SIDE_DIMENSION_BITS,
00087     NUM_SAMPLE_SIDE_NUM = 1u << SIDE_NUMBER_BITS,
00089     SIDE_NUMBER_MASK = NUM_SAMPLE_SIDE_NUM - 1,
00091     SIDE_DIMENSON_MASK = NUM_SAMPLE_SIDE_DIM - 1
00092   };
00093   
00095   inline size_t pack() const
00096     { return (((size_t)dimension) << SIDE_NUMBER_BITS) | number; }
00098   inline void unpack( size_t packed )
00099     { dimension = (packed >> SIDE_NUMBER_BITS) & SIDE_DIMENSON_MASK;
00100       number = packed & SIDE_NUMBER_MASK;
00101     }
00103   Sample( unsigned dim, unsigned num ) : dimension(dim), number(num) {}
00105   explicit Sample( size_t packed ) { unpack(packed); }
00110   Sample() {}
00111   
00112   bool operator==( const Sample& other ) const 
00113     { return pack() == other.pack(); }
00114   bool operator!=( const Sample& other ) const 
00115     { return pack() != other.pack(); }
00116   bool operator<( const Sample& other ) const 
00117     { return pack() < other.pack(); }
00118   bool operator>( const Sample& other ) const 
00119     { return pack() > other.pack(); }
00120   bool operator<=( const Sample& other ) const 
00121     { return pack() <= other.pack(); }
00122   bool operator>=( const Sample& other ) const 
00123     { return pack() >= other.pack(); }
00124 };
00125 
00126 std::ostream& operator <<( std::ostream& str, Sample s );
00127 
00128 } // namespace Mesquite
00129 
00130 #endif
